member.name: M:OpenQA.Selenium.Remote.PerfectoLabUtils.DownloadReport(OpenQA.Selenium.Remote.RemoteWebDriver,OpenQA.Selenium.Remote.DownloadReportTypes,System.String)
member.summary: DownloadReport is a function for downloading your report. types that you can use: pdf, html, csv, xml.
